thread.section_title: Vision Direct Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vision Direct Australia | www.visiondirect.com.au
thread.title: Paul
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text: Despite having some reservations from some previous reviews, I went ahead and purchased a pair of Tom Ford sunglasses. They arrived within seven working days. Upon careful examination and comparison I have no doubt the product is genuine. It was accompanied with genuine suede case, warranty certificates, cleaning cloth and paperwork. Would definitely make another purchase with vision direct and I am confident to recommend to my friends
